member.name: FILE_ATTRIBUTES_ARRAY
member.summary: Contains the clipboard format definition for CFSTR_FILE_ATTRIBUTES_ARRAY.

member.name: FILE_ATTRIBUTES_ARRAY.cItems
member.summary: The number of items in the rgdwFileAttributes array.

member.name: FILE_ATTRIBUTES_ARRAY.dwSumFileAttributes
member.summary: All of the attributes combined using OR.

member.name: FILE_ATTRIBUTES_ARRAY.dwProductFileAttributes
member.summary: All of the attributes combined using AND.
